siteMetadata.title: Christopher Froehlich's Blog | Hiking My Desk

node.excerpt: Every day that I drive, stuck in traffic, I find myself wishing for little things--often simple things to make my drive faster, safer, more…
I'm just one fellow, and not terribly educated at that; so my opinions may not be grounded in actuality. Nonetheless, I've been thinking of…
